amendment.description: An amendment numbered 78 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to reduce foreign assistance to certain countries based on the number of unaccompanied alien children who entered the US from those countries.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce foreign assistance to certain countries based on the number of unaccompanied alien children who entered the United States from those countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 244 (Roll no. 498).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 244 (Roll no. 498).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
